## Relationship between (a+b)^2^ and (a-b)^2^

\begin{eqnarray} 
(a+b)^2 &=& a^2+2ab+b^2     \nonumber \\
&=& a^2-2ab+b^2 + 2ab + 2ab \nonumber \\
&=& (a-b)^2 +4ab   \nonumber \\
\end{eqnarray}
